title: Create A Quarto Blog Post
text: goal quartopost create open Quarto blog post RStudio. quartopost() displays dialog window can enter data YAML header new blog post. Dialog window creating blog post clicking “Done” button function generates core skeleton Quarto post. includes: creating directory (named date title kebab notation) (optionally) copying images hard disk new folder creating index.qmd file YAML header populated data dialog window opening blog post file RStudio editing. can choose categories already created add new categories. package comes also RStudio Addin can bind quartopost() shortcut.
